metadata.title: CVE-2019-14267 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
PDFResurrect 0.15 has a buffer overflow via a crafted PDF file because dataassociated with startxref and %%EOF is mishandled.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-14267` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

pdfresurrect - 0.19-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: pdfresurrect package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.19-1').
